attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the British public are fed up with massive profiteering of greedy gas and electricity utilities suppliers. Which have become unaffordable to the working class masses in the United Kingdom.These greedy utility suppliers are adding extra profit to wholesale world prices at the expense of the poor and working class. We the British people who the government are supposed work for and listen to demand the British Government nationalise the gas and electricity suppliers at the earliest possible date.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
